title: Our house
creator_credit: Independent Television Service, Sugar Pictures and Meema Spadola
brief_description: This US documentary profiles children in five diverse families as they face the challenges and joys of growing up in gay/lesbian households. An inspiring and warming exploration of what family values really should be about. The five families come from diverse socio-economic, racial and religious backgrounds across the USA.
